entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Comox
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:07 AM PST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Comox Airport 1:00 PM PST Friday 06 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 7.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: 6.0°C
Wind: SE 39 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1
